nodes.documentation: @dev Return member address who holds the right to add/remove any member from specific role.
nodes.name: authorized

nodes.documentation: @dev Get All role ids array that has been assigned to a member so far.
nodes.name: roles
checkRole

params._authorized: Authorized member against every role id

authorized(uint256).details: Return member address who holds the right to add/remove any member from specific role.

changeAuthorized(uint256,address).details: Change Member Address who holds the authority to Add/Delete any member from specific role.

params._authorized: New authorized address against role id
params._roleId: roleId to update its Authorized Address

checkRole(address,uint256).details: Returns true if the given role id is assigned to a member.

params._roleId: Checks member's authenticity with the roleId. i.e. Returns true if this roleId is assigned to member

members(uint256).details: Gets the member addresses assigned by a specific role
members(uint256).return: roleId Role idallMemberAddress Member addresses of specified role id

roles(address).details: Get All role ids array that has been assigned to a member so far.

updateRole(address,uint256,bool).details: Assign or Delete a member from specific role.

params._active: active is set to be True if we want to assign this role to member, False otherwise!
